title: bluebit25
author: bluebit25
content: There was some similarity when I accidentally learned about T2T2, many people are probably still continuing on Friend Tech. And I bet this is a project filled with hype.  Are any of you interested in this project? As far as I know, they conduct IEO on Bitget, IEO details: https://www.bitget.com/events/launchpad/details/7121 I don't know much about the current events regarding this project, but from the looks of it, it seems like it's quite hyped to launch at the moment. What do you think about T2T2? Will this project cause many developers to launch and list similar products in the future, because when I learned about SocialFi, I wasn't sure what they could do or if they were simply taking advantage of the term to cause attention.

comments.author: Ryker1
comments.body: Quote from: bluebit25 on November 06, 2023, 10:57:08 AM[...]What do you think about T2T2? We know in the crypto industry, once there is a new project appears there could be a hype. When there is hype --for sure there could be fraud and people should be careful about that. I searched fake T2T2 and many reports that have been published about fake T2T2 projects. However --joining the exchange Launchpad event about this T2T2 is perhaps worth considering. As we know early holders perhaps have the potential to gain profit near the future when a bullish trend comes.

comments.author: Bureau
comments.body: Since they had their IEO on Bitget that gives a negative impression. The exchange itself is in question because of its KYC policies. They earlier made KYC non mandatory but now they have again made it mandatory. I personally won't recommend any projects that are being launched on that exchange as they tend to change their policies quite frequently.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Bureau on November 06, 2023, 11:54:37 AMSince they had their IEO on Bitget that gives a negative impression. The exchange itself is in question because of its KYC policies. They earlier made KYC non mandatory but now they have again made it mandatory. I personally won't recommend any projects that are being launched on that exchange as they tend to change their policies quite frequently. I wont consider legit if their prime exchange to choose is bitget since that platform is full of suspicious listing projects. Probably they have a lot of agents that find projects or listing with a fee on their pocket or commisions that why there are lot of listing. Not into fud but Ive seen some exchanges works like that and now they are dead.

comments.author: Joseph-P
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on November 06, 2023, 03:11:59 PMQuote from: Bureau on November 06, 2023, 11:54:37 AMSince they had their IEO on Bitget that gives a negative impression. The exchange itself is in question because of its KYC policies. They earlier made KYC non mandatory but now they have again made it mandatory. I personally won't recommend any projects that are being launched on that exchange as they tend to change their policies quite frequently. I wont consider legit if their prime exchange to choose is bitget since that platform is full of suspicious listing projects. Probably they have a lot of agents that find projects or listing with a fee on their pocket or commisions that why there are lot of listing. Not into fud but Ive seen some exchanges works like that and now they are dead. So basically, you're saying they too will be dead soon?

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: bluebit25 on November 06, 2023, 10:57:08 AMWill this project cause many developers to launch and list similar products in the future, because when I learned about SocialFi, I wasn't sure what they could do or if they were simply taking advantage of the term to cause attention.Looking at this, gives me the impression that this project is just another money grab scamQuoteT2T2 is a comprehensive Web3 social service platform deployed on Ethereum and Base Chain, focusing on innovative on-chain social interactions.I have been in the crypto space for 6 years and I have seen similar web3 social service platforms in the page… 99% of them pretty dead by now.Don't waste your time and money. As soon as it’s listed, it will dump hard until the tokens are not worth anything.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: I ain't interested in any clones or in the projects that solely pops up to cash-in on the hype of trend. We recently saw AI projects to cash-in on chatgpt hype, same is happening here and such projects won't last.
